content: developed by megan lapp aka crafty intentions this pattern is for a hungry caterpillar theme playset it is recommended for beginner skill level or above gauge is not crucial to the patterns as long as the stitches are tight enough to hold the stuffing a g size crochet hook is recommended with worsted weight yarn and you will need a darning needle to weave in the yarn ends and sew any holes shut this play set comprises 28 separate pieces this pattern explains how to make 8 of those items the rest can be made utilizing alternate free patterns by other designers this pattern is written in u s terminology have fun have your child or classroom tell the story of the very hungry caterpillar by feeding the caterpillar the correct food as you read the story they will be able to practice all kinds of skills like color recognition counting gross and fine motor skills the best part is that you clean up the toy as you play with it materials list yarn various per each individual item polyfil stuffing various hooks & scissors & darning needle a round storage bin or pop-up hamper with the following dimensions page | 1 © 2017 megan lapp all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only the pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced distributed or resold translated published altered shared or posted for sale or free over the internet or offline you can sell items made from this pattern provided they are handmade by yourself in a limited number and you give credit to the designer please add the following lines to your item description and any item you are selling this item is handmade by your name from a design and pattern by crafty intentions glossary of terms st = stitch slip_stitch = slip_stitch yo = yarn over chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase = 2 stitches in one space assume all increases are single_crochet increases unless otherwise specified decrease = decrease = one stitch combining two spaces all decreases are single_crochet decreases unless otherwise stated half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet fp = front post blo = back loop only skip = skip stitches double_crochet decrease = double_crochet decrease = yo insert hook into next stitch yo pull up yo pull through 2 loops yo insert hook into next stitch yo pull up yo pull through 2 loops yo pull through 3 remaining loops on hook triple single_crochet decrease = one stitch combining three spaces using single_crochet insert in next stitch space yo pull up x 3 yo pull through all four loops half trip = yo twice insert into next stitch yo pull up yo pull through 2 loops yo pull through all remaining loops treble_crochet = triple crochet = yo twice insert hook in the center of next chain yo draw yarn through stitch yo draw yarn through 2 loops on hook 3 times half trip decrease = yo twice
